title: WATCH | 5 heart-stopping Mexican Grand Prix moments through the years
text:
With plenty of points up for grabs and drivers jostling for positions, this weekend's Mexican Grand Prix has seen its fair share of drama and controversy over the years.

The likes of Ayrton Senna and Kimi Raikkonen have all had their fair share of incidents during the race.

Tough competition



Red Bull's Max Verstappen claimed victory in last season's race but it was Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton that clinched his fifth championship title overall.

Lewis Hamilton currently leads the points tally with 338, closely followed by team mate Valtteri Bottas. It's not been the best of seasons for Ferrari though with Charles Leclerc in third nd last season's runner-up Sebastian Vettel coming in at fifth.
